text: Aur iss say pehlay tumharay pass (hazrat) yousuf daleelen ley ker aaye phir bhi tum inn ki laaee hui (daleel) mein shak-o-shuba hi kertay rahey yahan tak kay jab unki wafaat hogaee to kehney lagay inn kay baad to Allah kissi rasool ko bhejay ga hi nahi issi tarah Allah gumrah kerta hai her uss shaks ko jo hadd say barh janey wala shak-o-shuba kerney wala ho
